events.message: Applicant has submitted the personal loan application for covering upcoming medical expenses and debt consolidation.
The submitted application has been categorised under personal loan, as it clearly mentions medical and debt-related purposes.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to manage the applicant’s personal loan request efficiently and provide personalized support.
Preliminary review of the application and submitted forms has been completed to assess the completeness and initial eligibility.
Additional documents such as recent medical bills, proof of income, and existing debt statements have been requested from the applicant.
Applicant has promptly submitted all requested documents including medical invoices and debt statements for further processing.
Credit history and score have been checked, showing a stable profile with some past payments delays that require evaluation.
Risk assessment report has been generated highlighting moderate risk associated with current outstanding debts and credit history.
A loan offer has been presented to the applicant detailing the terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule tailored for personal use.
Applicant responded positively to the offer, requesting minor adjustments in payment dates and clarification on some terms.
The application has been escalated to the credit committee for approval of the requested adjustments in repayment schedule.
After thorough review, the loan application has been approved with the adjusted terms agreed upon by both the applicant and lender.
Loan amount has been successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover the medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Follow-up call was made to ensure applicant is satisfied with loan terms and to address any questions about repayment or support services.
The loan application case has been formally closed after successful disbursement and initial customer satisfaction follow-up.
